results.text: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system. expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.

expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.
